rainfalls: As of today, there is no Heavy Rainfall Warning Issued.
thunderstorms:
Thunderstorm Advisory No. 14 #NCR_PRSD

Issued at: 5:30 AM, 29 June 2025(Sunday)



Moderate to heavy rainshowers with lightning and strong winds are expected over Tarlac, Bataan, Pampanga, Bulacan, Quezon, Laguna and Batangas within the next 2 hours.



The above conditions are being experienced in Metro Manila(Quezon City, Marikina), Rizal(Antipolo, Cardona, Binangonan, Pililla, Jala-Jala), Zambales(Palauig) and Cavite(Silang) which may persist within 2 hours and may affect nearby areas.



All are advised to take precautionary measures against the impacts associated with these hazards which include flash floods and landslides.



Keep monitoring for updates.
